text: Asahi, how was the TV recording?

It was fun~!
I got to see various people dance and sing.

The first group had restrained movements,
but their hand gestures were interesting. Like this...

Oh, impressive.
I feel like it was something like that.

The next band was really exciting!
During the interlude, they did this...

Yeah, they were really good at getting the audience
pumped up. They must be synchronizing well.
